preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 25 g of Cr, 25 g of Ge, 25 g of La, and 25 g of Nd using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure 80 g of O in the form of MgO or as a gas in a controlled environment. 
 3. Combine all measured materials in a clean, dry ceramic bowl. 
 4. Use a mortar and pestle to finely grind the mixture until homogeneous.
